title: Define Your Own Variables
description: In this video, I cover how to define, initialize, and use your own variables for the purpose of animating p5.js sketches.

timestamps.title: Hello! Let's talk more about variables!
What are we trying to make?
What are the steps to making a variable?
But the circle isn't moving! How can we fix that?
How can we make it interactive?

codeExamples.title: Moving Circle
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of using variables to change the position of a circle.

codeExamples.title: Growing Circle
codeExamples.description: (Exercise) Demonstration of using variables to change the size of a circle.

links.title: let vs var
links.description: Tutorial on different ways to declare a variable.
